verses.verse: And the word <WH1697> of the LORD <WH3068> came unto me, saying <WH559>,

Son <WH1121> of man <WH120>, prophesy <WH5012> against the prophets <WH5030> of Israel <WH3478> that prophesy <WH5012>, and say <WH559> thou unto them that prophesy <WH5030> out of their own hearts <WH3820>, Hear <WH8085> ye the word <WH1697> of the LORD <WH3068>; that prophesy out: Heb. that are prophets out of their own hearts

Thus saith <WH559> the Lord <WH136> GOD <WH3069>; Woe <WH1945> unto the foolish <WH5036> prophets <WH5030>, that follow <WH1980> <WH310> their own spirit <WH7307>, and have seen <WH7200> nothing! follow: Heb. walk after and: or, and things which they have not seen
O Israel <WH3478>, thy prophets <WH5030> are like the foxes <WH7776> in the deserts <WH2723>.

Ye have not gone up <WH5927> into the gaps <WH6556>, neither made up <WH1443> the hedge <WH1447> for the house <WH1004> of Israel <WH3478> to stand <WH5975> in the battle <WH4421> in the day <WH3117> of the LORD <WH3068>. gaps: or, breaches made: Heb. hedged the hedge

They have seen <WH2372> vanity <WH7723> and lying <WH3577> divination <WH7081>, saying <WH559>, The LORD <WH3068> saith <WH5002>: and the LORD <WH3068> hath not sent <WH7971> them: and they have made others to hope <WH3176> that they would confirm <WH6965> the word <WH1697>.

Have ye not seen <WH2372> a vain <WH7723> vision <WH4236>, and have ye not spoken <WH1696> a lying <WH3577> divination <WH4738>, whereas ye say <WH559>, The LORD <WH3068> saith <WH5002> it; albeit I have not spoken <WH559>?

Therefore thus saith <WH559> the Lord <WH136> GOD <WH3069>; Because ye have spoken <WH1696> vanity <WH7723>, and seen <WH2372> lies <WH3577>, therefore, behold, I am against you, saith <WH5002> the Lord <WH136> GOD <WH3069>.

And mine hand <WH3027> shall be upon the prophets <WH5030> that see <WH2374> vanity <WH7723>, and that divine <WH7080> lies <WH3577>: they shall not be in the assembly <WH5475> of my people <WH5971>, neither shall they be written <WH3789> in the writing <WH3791> of the house <WH1004> of Israel <WH3478>, neither shall they enter <WH935> into the land <WH127> of Israel <WH3478>; and ye shall know <WH3045> that I am the Lord <WH136> GOD <WH3069>. assembly: or, secret, or, counsel

Because, even because they have seduced <WH2937> my people <WH5971>, saying <WH559>, Peace <WH7965>; and there was no peace <WH7965>; and one built up <WH1129> a wall <WH2434>, and, lo <WH2009>, others daubed <WH2902> it with untempered <WH8602> morter: a wall: or, a slight wall

Say <WH559> unto them which daub <WH2902> it with untempered <WH8602> morter, that it shall fall <WH5307>: there shall be an overflowing <WH7857> shower <WH1653>; and ye <WH859>, O great hailstones <WH417> <WH68>, shall fall <WH5307>; and a stormy <WH5591> wind <WH7307> shall rend <WH1234> it.
Lo, when the wall <WH7023> is fallen <WH5307>, shall it not be said <WH559> unto you, Where is the daubing <WH2915> wherewith ye have daubed <WH2902> it?

Therefore thus saith <WH559> the Lord <WH136> GOD <WH3069>; I will even rend <WH1234> it with a stormy <WH5591> wind <WH7307> in my fury <WH2534>; and there shall be an overflowing <WH7857> shower <WH1653> in mine anger <WH639>, and great hailstones <WH417> <WH68> in my fury <WH2534> to consume <WH3617> it.

So will I break down <WH2040> the wall <WH7023> that ye have daubed <WH2902> with untempered <WH8602> morter, and bring <WH5060> it down to the ground <WH776>, so that the foundation <WH3247> thereof shall be discovered <WH1540>, and it shall fall <WH5307>, and ye shall be consumed <WH3615> in the midst <WH8432> thereof: and ye shall know <WH3045> that I am the LORD <WH3068>.

Thus will I accomplish <WH3615> my wrath <WH2534> upon the wall <WH7023>, and upon them that have daubed <WH2902> it with untempered <WH8602> morter, and will say <WH559> unto you, The wall <WH7023> is no more, neither they that daubed <WH2902> it;

To wit, the prophets <WH5030> of Israel <WH3478> which prophesy <WH5012> concerning Jerusalem <WH3389>, and which see <WH2374> visions <WH2377> of peace <WH7965> for her, and there is no peace <WH7965>, saith <WH5002> the Lord <WH136> GOD <WH3069>.

Likewise, thou son <WH1121> of man <WH120>, set <WH7760> thy face <WH6440> against the daughters <WH1323> of thy people <WH5971>, which prophesy <WH5012> out of their own heart <WH3820>; and prophesy <WH5012> thou against them,

And say <WH559>, Thus saith <WH559> the Lord <WH136> GOD <WH3069>; Woe <WH1945> to the women that sew <WH8609> pillows <WH3704> to all armholes <WH679> <WH3027>, and make <WH6213> kerchiefs <WH4555> upon the head <WH7218> of every stature <WH6967> to hunt <WH6679> souls <WH5315>! Will ye hunt <WH6679> the souls <WH5315> of my people <WH5971>, and will ye save <WH2421> the souls <WH5315> alive <WH2421> that come unto you? armholes: or, elbows

And will ye pollute <WH2490> me among my people <WH5971> for handfuls <WH8168> of barley <WH8184> and for pieces <WH6595> of bread <WH3899>, to slay <WH4191> the souls <WH5315> that should not die <WH4191>, and to save <WH2421> the souls <WH5315> alive <WH2421> that should not live <WH2421>, by your lying <WH3576> to my people <WH5971> that hear <WH8085> your lies <WH3577>?

Wherefore thus saith <WH559> the Lord <WH136> GOD <WH3069>; Behold, I am against your pillows <WH3704>, wherewith ye <WH859> there hunt <WH6679> the souls <WH5315> to make them fly <WH6524>, and I will tear <WH7167> them from your arms <WH2220>, and will let the souls <WH5315> go <WH7971>, even the souls <WH5315> that ye hunt <WH6679> to make them fly <WH6524>. to make: or, into gardens

Your kerchiefs <WH4555> also will I tear <WH7167>, and deliver <WH5337> my people <WH5971> out of your hand <WH3027>, and they shall be no more in your hand <WH3027> to be hunted <WH4686>; and ye shall know <WH3045> that I am the LORD <WH3068>.

Because with lies <WH8267> ye have made the heart <WH3820> of the righteous <WH6662> sad <WH3512>, whom I have not made sad <WH3510>; and strengthened <WH2388> the hands <WH3027> of the wicked <WH7451>, that he should not return <WH7725> from his wicked <WH7563> way <WH1870>, by promising him life <WH2421>: by: or, that I should save his life: Heb. by quickening him

Therefore ye shall see <WH2372> no more vanity <WH7723>, nor divine <WH7080> divinations <WH7081>: for I will deliver <WH5337> my people <WH5971> out of your hand <WH3027>: and ye shall know <WH3045> that I am the LORD <WH3068>.
